column5: Just picked up my 2010 license at BJs in Bewdely, just to let everyone know they will be closed on Jan 1st, they will be open on the weekend, and are in the process of moving huts out as im posting this, there was 9 inches of ice in Bewdely Bay as of last weekend, and very little snow on top, if any, they have pinheads and will be ready to go on Saturday, as well as the new 2010 regulation books.   Happy New Year and Cheers
